title: Street Food Bar Taikuri
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Second place in this city to serve seitan. Has multiple different vegetarian options which all can be made vegan. Has daily buffet for "pockets" which you fill with salad and vegetables - could ask for tofu or seitan from the bar. Menu has burgers, pockets and tacos with seitan, tofu or soy. Order fries, sweet potato fries or green salad and drinks separately with special meal price. Fast service.
